text:
@realDonaldTrump Mr President, you are obviously not able to read the figures from a US university correctly. Your downplaying is not funny. You are responsible for anyone who dies needlessly.
Pure ignorance!
Read and understand this! Best every single Morning at breakfast
https://t.co/mEgSiJf8fY
